reviews.review: WHY IS THIS GAME SO FUCKING BORING. Fun fact I bought this game with portal 2 and I missed the 2 week refund date because I was new to steam. I had 30 minutes on this game and 0 minutes on portal 2. I wish I could go back in time and stop myself from buying this game. It was one of my first steam purchases and I regret it so much.

As the time I've played indicates, this is a very short game, but what takes other games hours to accomplish, this game crams into minutes. Speaking of time, I can't believe I've waited so many years to play this, though the experience feels as fresh now as the year it came out. What can I say? It's a timeless classic, and a perfect example of a must-play game.

A classic that stands the test of time. Creative and fun puzzles that never get boring. GLaDOS is one of the best characters I have ever seen in a videogame, and the only one that has made me laugh out loud regularly - and I don't mean blow-air-out-nose-harder-than-usual laugh, I mean [i] actually [/i] laugh. The only potential downside is some might consider it too short of a game. Otherwise it's a 10/10

这款游戏放在今天依旧是精品，更何况这还是13年前的游戏。创意十足的游戏，既有解密，又有跑酷元素。剧情与玩家进度配合非常好，尤其是最后面的boss战十分精彩。当然最后面那首歌也很厉害，即贴合剧情又好听。打折时第一二部加起来才6软妹币，既好玩又便宜，买了绝对不亏。游戏十分经典，晕3D的也可以购入作收藏，没准哪天不晕了就可以来玩了呢（划）。我个人是去年或是今年年初一二部打折一起购入的，第一次玩到第17关左右就没再玩了，换电脑后这两天又在库里翻到了于是从头玩起，重新体验了传送门。说句题外话，第二部居然支持联机！！快拉上好朋友一起来玩！！
Es muy entretenido, el problema es que es algo corto

This game is great, very good, it runs on some low-cost computers with low, medium and generally good qualities. But ... we have the problem of the game not being very big, so, it doesn't have bonus levels anymore, and you get tired because it's the same thing, to be able to change texture or level, you have to download everything on the internet. Well, I think the game is incredibly good, basic and at the same time very good, a basic puzzle style game, one of the good ones since 2006 or 2005, I highly recommend it !!! and P0RTAL 2 also
good

Portal je legendární logickou hrou na enginu Source. Tuto hru dnes zná snad každý a tak si myslím, že není třeba se o ni nějak hodně rozepisovat. Příběh je zde základní a jen aby byl. Největší zaměření je na gameplay, který ve své době vyvolal pořádný rozruch mezi hráči. Grafika je typická pro tento engine. V dnešní době tato hra člověka už ničím nepřekvapí, ale jelikož je krátká a gameplay je na dobré úrovni, tak bych doporučil si ji zahrát i dnes.
 
+ povedený gameplay
+ nostalgie

Great game I suggest getting it.

《portal》里的传送枪是我所玩过的游戏里最有意思的武器之一（另一把是同样来自valve的重力枪）《portal》这部游戏不仅有像传送枪这样有趣的游戏机制，还有精雕细磨的关卡设计，掺杂着黑色幽默的优秀剧情，锦上添花的高难度彩蛋，以及能将想法付之实践的技术和游戏引擎（暂且不提起源的祖传的bug）这无疑体现出了当年v社的技术力，以及起源引擎的能力。
